knimeNode.name: Conformal Prediction Loop End
knimeNode.shortDescription: Aggregates the results of conformal prediction: calibration tables, processed prediction table and models (optional).

fullDescription.intro: Aggregates the results of conformal prediction: calibration tables, processed prediction table and models (optional).

ports.inPort: Scored prediction table based on test table. This table is built using the calibration table and aggregated over all iterations using median P-values
Calibration table created by Conformal Calibrator node
(Optional) Additional port for models or any other auxiliary tables.
